verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, we bow before Your glory manifested in Your Son. Radiant with Your perfect beauty, He is heav'n's Beloved One. Saving grace has given us vision, opened eyes that one were blind. He on whom brought derision now delights our heart and mind.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Such a Savior, now exalted, well deserves our heartfelt praise. Dying He has death defeated; ris'n He reigns for endless days. Now in heaven interceding, Jesus, Friend of sinners, prays for the weakest, daily pleading; all sufficient is His grace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O that we might know You better, Jesus Christ, our living Lord. Let our love grow daily greater as we hear Your Holy Word. There You have revealed Your glory, there we marvel at Your grace. Feed our souls and make us like You till we see You face to face.
